Career Opportunities

Brief description

Seeking a senior Drupal back-end Developer. Someone who knows the in and outs of Drupal like no-other. Someone who is fluent in PHP, knows MySQL, AJAX, and some javascript. Someone who has been in the field for 5+ years and knows what they are doing. Someone who can work well with others, as well as on their own.

Must have

5+ years experience in the field

Know the in and outs of Drupal

Have a kick-ass attitude

Love coffee...nah j.k. - but we really do consume a lot of coffee here.

Understanding of but not limited to PHP, MySQL, AJAX, javascript

Nice to haves

Experience with the Web Experience Toolkit (WxT)

Experience working with or for government clients

Likes to buy timbits for the office ... no really ... we like timbits.

Basic understanding of CSS & HTML

Working on OSX

About OpenPlus

OpenPlus is a Drupal based web development company. We create innovative, yet accessable websites for clients like: Government, Museums, Universities, etc. Ever since we opened in 2003, we have been expanding and taking on bigger and better clients. Are you up for it ?

Apply Now

Brief description

Seeking a Drupal Front End Developer. Someone who is a wizz at all things front end. You live and breath SASS, jQuery & HTML. You love learning new technologies like coffee script, node.js, etc. Ideally someone who understands drupal themeing - but if not must be a fast learner.

Must have

5+ years experience in the field

jQuery Wizard

SASS Magician

Know CSS3, HTML5, jQuery or equivalent of

Nice to haves

Experience with drupal theming.

Experience working with or for government clients

Likes to buy timbits for the office ... no really ... we like timbits.

Knowing PHP is a huge bonus

Understanding command line

About OpenPlus

OpenPlus is a Drupal based web development company. We create innovative, yet accessable websites for clients like: Government, Museums, Universities, etc. Ever since we opened in 2003, we have been expanding and taking on bigger and better clients. Are you up for it ?
